title: About Content
aboutDescription: An experienced SAP IDM professional and MSCE-certified expert. Develops IDM solutions (v7.1 to v8.0). Available for new projects or long-term positions, offering technical expertise to optimize your environment.
connectDescription: Experienced SAP IDM professional and MSCE-certified expert.
Drive your IDM projects to success with my technical expertise.

jobs.title: Sailpoint Technical Screener
bulletPoints: Screened a total of 28 candidates for two different projects, one with Anthem Health Insurance and one for California Coast Credit Union.

jobs.title: SAP IDM Architect
bulletPoints: Worked with SAP IDM at Westinghouse (client) to address an unreliable identity management system with poor user experience following the early exit of a previous development team.
Revamped the entire system and resolved outstanding issues within six months.
Transformed development environments and brought the system to achieve stakeholder vision.
jobs.excerpt: B² TECHNICAL SERVICES, Pittsburg, PA / Sylvania, OH

jobs.title: Senior Technical Consultant, SailPoint Identity IQ
bulletPoints: Leveraged Postman API developer to write code that allowed the Identity IQ system to provision information on user accounts to various systems, ensuring certain users had access to specific systems. Designed API calls that would execute whenever there was a change in identity-based information in the system to streamline capabilities.
